alert.note: Alert for Northern Harrison; Northern Jackson; Southern Harrison; Southern Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 1:35PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Harrison and western Jackson Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 134 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near McHenry to near Long Beach. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Ocean Springs, Long Beach, St. Martin, D`iberville, Saucier, Latimer, Gulf Hills, Lyman, Gulf Park Estates and Gulfport Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 26 and 57. Interstate 110 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in New Orleans.
